visualization_prompt: Generate a stock chart showing AAPL historical prices using time-series financial data with Fibonacci technical indicators
visualization_explanation: This stock chart visualization uses time-series financial data (1D interval) with datetime x-axis and continuous price y-axis. The synthetic data from Highcharts demo API maintains realistic stock market characteristics including volatility clustering and non-normal distribution. The stock chart type was chosen for its native support of financial time-series features like range selector and technical indicators. The Fibonacci Time Zones annotation follows Cairo's preattentive processing principles using high-contrast green (#06d001) for pattern recognition. The non-ordinal x-axis ensures accurate time gaps representation, while IBM Plex Sans font (14px) maintains Tufte's data-ink ratio through clean typography.
